Class Customer

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Represents a Customer in the Flight Booking System.
Author:
UmaeerH, AnisaU

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(int id, String name, String phone, String email, boolean deleted)
      Constructor to create a Customer object.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the customer.
      name - The name of the customer.
      phone - The phone number of the customer.
      email - The email address of the customer.
      deleted - Indicates if the customer is marked as deleted.

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking(Booking booking) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a booking to the customer's list of bookings.
      Parameters:
      booking - The booking to add.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If the customer already has a booking for the same flight and date.
